title: plans for cpp-terminal
body:
*Original issue*: https://gitlab.com/lfortran/lfortran/-/issues/698

Hey,

I'm currently extending cpp-terminal with a few features that are planed for a while now. Since this is the project that depends on the multi-line prompt, I'd like to ask you for help.

I'm currently working on the window class and create a PR on that over at cpp-terminal on github. I'm sure though that this will break the already problematic prompt implementation. It would be cool if you guys could assist me at merging the new window class into the prompt code base when the PR is done.

Also what about using the current repository version instead of a separate downstream in this this project? That would move the work that is made and especially the bug fixing to the upstream and everyone can benefit from that (if you haven't done that already). I know though that after the last merge of the new prompt some features broken like key combinations. We should fix that first of course, maybe also clean up the code a bit.

So yeah, what are your thoughts on that?

Thank you
